forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. West wind around 17 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 54, with temperatures rising to around 56 overnight. Southwest wind 3 to 13 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening settles over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle hush falls on the city bathed in a soft, tender glow from streetlights and distant buildings. The forecast for today offers a pleasant reprieve, with sunny spells yielding to rolling patches of cloud. The air is crisp, buoyed by a brisk wind that stirs the leaves without intruding on one’s sense of peace. As night descends, temperatures will tiptoe upward to a mild 56 degrees, cloaked in an inviting layer of partial cloud cover. 

The lingering marine layer, a soft breath from the ocean, may create delicate bands of fog along the coast, casting an ethereal quality over landmarks such as the Golden Gate Bridge. As you venture out, a light jacket would suffice, allowing you to wander the vibrant streets or perhaps find a cozy café to enjoy a warm cup or a leisurely conversation with a friend. This delightful evening invites exploration—be it a stroll along the Embarcadero or an intimate gathering with good company, encapsulating the very essence of urban life.
